container=document.querySelector(n);if(a==='cover'&&(!config.eInfo||!config.eInfo[a])){return} let content=config.eInfo[a]?config.eInfo[a]:'';if(container){if(n==='.anime-cover img'&&container.tagName==='IMG'){container.src=content}else{container.innerHTML=content}}} function moveElement2(e,n,t){let o=document.querySelector(e);let c=document.querySelector(n);if(c){if(o){c.innerHTML=o.innerHTML;o.remove()}else{c.innerHTML=t}}} if(typeof config!=='undefined'&&config.eInfo){moveElement('.japanese','japanese');moveElement('.aired','aired');moveElement('.duration','duration');moveElement('.episode','episodes');moveElement('.producers','producers');moveElement('.anime-cover img','cover')};function handlePlayButtonClick(){if(typeof episodes!=='undefined'){if(!document.title.startsWith("Watch ")){document.title="Watch "+document.title} initializeEpisodes();const dropdown=document.querySelector('.e-bookmark .dropdown');const itemAdd=document.querySelector('.item-add');if(dropdown&&itemAdd){while(dropdown.firstChild){itemAdd.appendChild(dropdown.firstChild)}} document.querySelector('.watch-wrap')?.classList.remove('d-none');document.querySelector('.comments')?.classList.remove('d-none');document.querySelector('.anime-servers')?.classList.remove('d-none');document.querySelector('.btn-play')?.classList.add('d-none');document.querySelector('.character')?.classList.add('d-none');document.querySelector('.content-split')?.classList.add('in-watch');document.querySelector('#main_area')?.classList.add('anime-single','anime-watch');const posterSplit=document.querySelector('.poster-split');if(posterSplit){posterSplit.remove()}}} window.addEventListener('load',function(){var title=document.title;var url=window.location.href;if(!title.includes('Streaming')){var newUrl=url.replace(/(\?ep=\d+)/,'');window.history.replaceState(null,'',newUrl)}});if(typeof .stick-play').forEach(button=>button.remove())}else{episodes.forEach(episode=>{episode.servers.forEach(server=>{if(server.value.includes('/p/file.html')){server.value+=`&${episode.cover || .stick-play').forEach(button=>{button.addEventListener('click',event=>{event.preventDefault();window.scrollTo({top:0,behavior:'smooth'});handlePlayButtonClick()})})} document.querySelectorAll('.item-light').forEach(function(item){item.addEventListener('click',function(event){event.stopPropagation();item.classList.toggle('active');if(document.querySelector('.item-light.active')){document.querySelector('.blur-mask').classList.add('play')}else{document.querySelector('.blur-mask').classList.remove('play')} if(item.classList.contains('active')){document.getElementById('header').style.zIndex=4;document.getElementById('watch-target').style.zIndex='12'}else{document.getElementById('header').style.zIndex='';document.getElementById('watch-target').style.zIndex=''}})});document.addEventListener('click',function(event){if(!document.getElementById('watch-target').contains(event.target)&&!event.target.classList.contains('item-light')){document.querySelectorAll('.item-light').forEach(function(item){item.classList.remove('active')});document.querySelector('.blur-mask').classList.remove('play');document.getElementById('header').style.zIndex='';document.getElementById('watch-target').style.zIndex=''}})
